featured.text: For instance, a ventilated hard hat was developed to keep wearers cooler, and see-through face shields were attached to better see the hazards lurking above.

definition.zh_def: 潛伏，隱藏，通常指在某個地方靜靜地等待或觀察。
definition.en_def: To remain hidden or concealed, often with the intention of observing or waiting.
definition.example: He decided to lurk in the shadows to surprise his friends.
